name: Dead Mall Side Scroller
description:
Entry for My First Game Jam: Summer 2018 (and is, for real, my first game)

You are a wayward soul, wandering a dead mall. The thirst is real, and you need to find something to drink. Your only hope is a vending machine on the other end of the mall.

Controls:

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space - Jump
